title: SHANY 2012 Nail Art Polish Stamp Manicure Image Plates set of 25pcs
description: The original Shany image plates, designed and created by Shany, in set of 25 image plates, each plates measure about 1.8 inch with sanded edges for easy handling and protective nylon screen on each. All image plates are from stainless steel. All designs are from 2011 collection and you will get 25 image plates with 6 to 10 design on each. For easy instruction check the pictures to learn how easy it can be to put some art on your nail without going to salon. Shany image plate kit comes with Shany logo and trademark.

title: Facial Hair Remover Stick Epilator Threading Beauty Tool
description: Every woman has undesired peach fuzz on her face, and every woman has gone through the pain and discomfort of tweezing, waxing or using harsh chemicals to remove that peach fuzz.This Threading Beauty Tool is designed to easily removes unwanted hair without harming your skin.  In just 2 minutes your unwanted facial hair will be gone!! Different from common depilatory device , this epilator could pull up  your fine hair by root. So you don't have to worry about the hair would send forth again in only few days.Using our epilator you can keep your skin smooth without the annoying fine hair for a long time. You can get rid of the removed fine hair growing thicker and tougher in few days. Given its excellent effect and convenience, this style of epilator is recommended by many female stars. With it ,you can remove your tiny fine hair thoroughly and quickly without pain.A natural, safe and convenient method to remove unwanted facial hair this Threading Beauty Tool works like tweezers except that it removes small areas of hair instead of one or two hairs at a time. No chemicals or creams are needed.

title: Frizz Ease Heat Defeat Protective Styling Spray By JOHN FRIEDA, 6 Ounce
description: Works with heat tools. Conditions and strengthens for up to 24 hours. ThermaGuard complex protects against damage. Defend straight styles to the end. This protective spray straightens strands for up to 24 hours. This helps block humidity and rehydrates.

title: 100% Pure 100% Pure Nourishing Facial Oil 1 fl oz - 1 fl oz
description: Heal, soothe, and protect your skin with 100% Pure Nourishing Facial Oil. Its light, silky concentrated formula brings the maximum benefits of a highly potent blend of the most effective anti-aging, healing, and protective antioxid ants. It pure formula wont clog pores or cause breakouts.
